SELECT cr.id id, ci.id caseId, CASE WHEN cr.sender_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.LitigantTypeEnum@PROPESER.getValue()} THEN cp.prop_name END propName, CASE WHEN cr.sender_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.LitigantTypeEnum@DEFENDANT.getValue()} THEN cd.prop_name END defeName, CASE WHEN cr.sender_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ManagerInfoTypeEnum@ARBITRATION_SECRETARY.getCode()} THEN m.name END arbiSecretariesName, CASE WHEN cr.sender_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.LitigantTypeEnum@PROPESER.getValue()} THEN c.name END propAgentName, CASE WHEN cr.sender_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.LitigantTypeEnum@DEFENDANT.getValue()} THEN d.name END defeAgentName, cr.content content, cr.create_time createTime, cr.sender_type senderType FROM compromise_record cr, case_proposer cp, case_defendant cd, case_info ci LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ui.name, cm.case_id FROM case_manager cm, user_info ui WHERE cm.manager_id = ui.id AND cm.case_id = #{caseId} AND cm.manager_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ManagerInfoTypeEnum@ARBITRATION_SECRETARY.getCode()} AND cm.status=${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseManagerStatusEnum@OK.getCode()} ) m ON m.case_id = ci.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ci.id, ui.name FROM case_info ci, case_agent ca, user_info ui WHERE ci.id = ca.case_id AND ca.agent_id = ui.id AND ci.id = #{caseId} AND ca.litigant_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseAgentTypeEnum@DEFE_AGENT.getCode()} ) c ON ci.id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ci.id, ui.name FROM case_info ci, case_agent ca, user_info ui WHERE ci.id = ca.case_id AND ca.agent_id = ui.id AND ci.id = #{caseId} AND ca.litigant_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseAgentTypeEnum@PROP_AGENT.getCode()} ) d ON ci.id = d.id WHERE cr.case_id = ci.id AND ci.id = cp.case_id AND ci.id = cd.case_id AND ci.id = #{caseId} ORDER BY cr.create_time ASC
